title: Can't recover account.
body: Hi, I can't recover my old account, any help? I reset my pass and account, but I still can't login. What should I do? Riot doesn't answer my tickets. Thanks.

replies.body: If you're having problems getting logged into your account due to an incorrect password, your best way of getting back in is to reach out to our account team in your ticket. I see that you've already sent us a couple tickets, so our agents will be able to help shortly!
